<-25.name: Spectacular Failure
<-25.text: You make a thorough mess of your attempt as you forget even the most basic principles of this maneuver. You are at -20 modification to your next two actions while you recover from your stunning failure.

-25:04.name: Absolute Failure
-25:04.text: Your remarkable failure marks you for ridicule. Hope your parents weren’t watching…

5:65.name: Failure
5:65.text: You fail. Your skill is not up to the task. Maybe next time.

66:66.name: Unusual Event
66:66.text: Your maneuver is beset by an unusual event. It may or may not be a beneficial occurrence (GM should choose or determine randomly).

67:75.name: Failure
67:75.text: You fail. Your skill is not up to the task. Maybe next time.

76:90.name: Partial Success
76:90.text: You fail. Your skill is not up to the task. Maybe next time.

91:99.name: Near Success
91:99.text: You are within sight of your goal! If appropriate, you may attempt to complete your maneuver with another roll with a modification of +10.

100:100.name: Unusual Success
100:100.text: You fail. Your skill is not up to the task. Maybe next time.

101:110.name: Near Success
101:110.text: You are within sight of your goal! If appropriate, you may attempt to complete your maneuver with another roll with a modification of +10.

111:175.name: Success
111:175.text: Congratulations! You are completely successful in your attempt. Carry on.

>175.name: Absolute Success
>175.text: Zounds! Your masterful performance has stretched the boundaries of your own abilities! You operate at +10 (non-cumulative) to all future attempts to use this skill, until you receive a result of Absolute Failure or Spectacular Failure.
